paramSchema.title: Statistics URL
paramSchema.name: url
paramSchema.description: The URL endpoint of where the nginx statistics are hosted.

paramSchema.title: Username
paramSchema.name: username
paramSchema.description: If the endpoint is password protected, what username should graphdat use when calling it.

paramSchema.title: Password
paramSchema.name: password
paramSchema.description: If the endpoint is password protected, what password should graphdat use when calling it.
